values: frighten away/off [phrasal verb]frighten (someone or something) away/off: to cause (someone or something) to go away or stay away because of fear吓走The dog frightened the prowler away.狗吓走了那个鬼鬼祟祟转悠的人。Tourists have been frightened off by the violence in the city.游客被市区的暴乱吓跑了。 frighten
